name: Sorry Mummy
description:
Game created for Game Jam GameDev.Tv 2022 and also for my Game Dev Faculty (Brazil, Unisinos).

Mandatory themes for Game Jam GemeDev.Tv 2022:

  • Death is Only The Beginning (The game is about mumies, so...)

Mandatory themes for my Game Dev Faculty:

  • A Three Man Duel (Three mummies fighting puzzles wiling to find cleopatra's mummy again)
  • Multiple Control (You have to control three mumies to complete the puzzles)

A few comments from me.

  • This was my first game ever created start to finish... I had already created some prototypes, but nothing "so complete".
  • The GameDev.Tv gave us 10 days to complete the game. But I was waiting for my Faculty to release the themes for the prototype of the week for me to create only 1 single game containing all 3 of the themes.
  • Ive create this game in 4 days. (About 60h of work.. Yes Im on bournout)
  • Im planning to keep working on the game.. Ive made already some more things that I didnt get the time to introduce in the project. But im planning to add more puzzle types in future versions of the game. :)

Update 1.2

  • Improved hints for level 2 and 3.
  • Puzzle improvement at level 3
  • Improved Debug Panel
  • Now Pressure Plates move down while pressed
  • Now Pressure Plates change color when breaked by bone
  • Mummies turning sensibility is now 20% slower
  • Changed source files from 'Mummy Trio' to 'Sorry Mummy'
  • General minor bugs fixes

 

Working on for 1.3:

  • Curently some mummies can climb over each other. (Bug)
  • Give the player the possibilite to change the sensibility of turning
